headline: BlackRock boosts outlook for US stocks after tariffs pause
summary: The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Monday that it is taking a modestly more bullish stance on U.S. stocks following the announcement of a 90-day pause in implementing most U.S. tariffs.  The near-term risk of a "financial accident" has eased following the Trump administration's decision to pause of hefty  tariffs on most countries, according to a report from the research arm of asset management giant BlackRock.
